description: Google has now released the Gemini 3 Pro artificial intelligence (AI) model. Although it is available in preview, and the rollout across the globe might take a couple of days, the Mountain View-based tech giant has already started announcing its integration across its suite of products. Two of the company’s products that are getting the model’s capabilities are the Gemini app and AI Mode in Search.
title: Gemini 3 Release Comes With a Redesigned Gemini App, New Features for AI Mode

description: Scientists mapped the path of interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS with ten times greater accuracy using images from ESA’s Mars orbiter. The breakthrough shows how observations from different points in space can improve future planetary defense. The data, the first of its kind from another planet’s orbit, offers a powerful new tool for tracking fast-moving cosmic objects.
title: Mars Orbiter Tracks Interstellar Comet 3I/ATLAS With Unprecedented Precision

description: After debris punctured a window on the Shenzhou-20 spacecraft, China will launch an uncrewed Shenzhou-22 lifeboat to Tiangong to protect its crew. The capsule will deliver supplies and guarantee a safe return, highlighting growing orbital-debris dangers and echoing similar past incidents such as Russia’s Soyuz MS-22 failure.
title: China to Launch Empty Shenzhou-22 Lifeboat After Shenzhou-20 Damage

description: Google finally released the Gemini 3 family of artificial intelligence (AI) models on Tuesday. The Mountain View-based tech giant called it the company’s most intelligent AI model yet, highlighting that it outperforms its predecessor as well as OpenAI’s GPT-5.1 in every single major benchmark. The new AI model brings improvements across various aspects, including reasoning, conversations, coding, mathematics, as well as agentic capabilities.
title: Gemini 3 Released as Google’s Most Intelligent AI Models Yet, Outperforms GPT-5.1 and Claude 4.5 Sonnet

description: Researchers at JMU Würzburg have achieved the first autonomous in-orbit satellite orientation using an AI controller on the InnoCube CubeSat. Trained through deep reinforcement learning, the AI repeatedly reoriented the spacecraft, demonstrating a major step toward fully autonomous, lower-cost satellite systems and future AI-managed missions.
title: German Team Uses Autonomous AI to Steer CubeSat in Space

description: Witness how a Yale professor finds herself on the crossroads where her star student accuses her colleague of sexual abuse.
title: After The Hunt OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch This Julia Roberts Starrer Thriller Film

description: The Asus ProArt P16 has a premium and sleek design language. The laptop packs a 16-inch 4K OLED display that offers decent colours. It also features a powerful AMD Ryzen AI 9 HX 370 processor that can deliver powerful performance, while Nvidia GeForce RTX 5090 provides a seamless gaming experience.
title: Asus ProArt P16 (2025) Review: Is it a MacBook Pro Killer?

description: Starring Austin Butler in the lead role, Caught Stealing is a dark comedy thriller film that has now landed on digital screens for rent.
title: Caught Stealing Available for Rent in India: Know Everything About This American Dark Comedy

description: Using ALMA’s ultra-sensitive Band 9 observations, astronomers identified galaxy Y1 as an extreme star-forming system in the early universe. Producing stars at 180 solar masses per year, Y1 reveals how intense, short-lived starbursts helped shape young galaxies and may have been more common than previously believed.
title: Extreme Star Factory: ALMA Detects Galaxy Y1 Forming Stars 180 Times Faster Than the Milky Way

description: Ravi Teja as Lakshman in Mass Jathara is a railway policeman who embodies righteousness and honesty. It's when he finds Don Sivedu trying to smuggle drugs through a train that he tries to stop, which leads to a feud and backlash from politicians—now streaming in theaters, soon to be released on Netflix.
title: Mass Jathara OTT Release Date Leaked Online: When and Where to Watch Ravi Teja Starrer Movie

description: Relay is a Riz Ahmed-starrer conspiracy thriller film that is set to land on the digital screens soon. The film follows a broker whose rules are challenged, only to save his client’s life. The film will begin streaming on Nov. 21st, 2025, only on LionsgatePlay.
title: Relay OTT Release Date: Know Everything About Streaming, Plot, Cast, and More

description: Choosing a budget smartphone that would best suit your needs is difficult to choose, due to the presence of a plethora of options. Various brands, like Samsung, Xiaomi, Poco, iQOO, Realme, and Redmi, offer multiple models in the budget segment in the country via different e-commerce platforms. If you want to check out the specifications, features, current prices in India, retail channels, and other details about budget phones, we have created a list for you, which will help you make an informed choice.
title: Best Budget Smartphones Under Rs 15,000 in India: iQOO Z10x, Poco M7 Pro 5G, Realme 13 and More

description: iQOO 15 will launch at a higher price, as confirmed by the company CEO. In an exclusive chat with Gadgets 360, Nipun Marya, CEO of iQOO, confirmed that the flagship smartphone will be priced around Rs. 65,000-70,000 after launch offers. This will mean that the actual price will be more than
title: Exclusive: iQOO 15 Effective India Price Likely Rs. 65,000-70,000 Amid Soaring Component Costs

description: WhatsApp has reportedly begun introducing multi-account support on iOS, giving users the ability to use two accounts in a single app while maintaining separate chats, alerts and privacy controls. The feature, available to a limited group of beta testers on version 25.34.10.72, adds an Account List menu, enhanced notification handling, easy switching options and App Lock protection. A broader release is anticipated in future updates. On Android, the multi-account feature is already fully available.
title: WhatsApp for iOS Finally Begins Testing Multi-Account Support With Seamless Switching

description: Indian employees lack clear workplace guidance on using artificial intelligence, according to a new Udemy–YouGov survey of 1,126 workers. Only three in ten feel confident using AI independently, and 61 percent say organisations offer no practical direction. Middle-aged employees report the lowest skill adequacy. Despite this, motivation to upskill remains high, highlighting a gap between employee readiness and institutional support.
title: Indian Employees Lack Guidance to Use AI at Work, Says New Research

description: Microsoft is testing Agent Workspace, a new experimental AI agent in Windows 11 for Insiders. The feature creates a contained workspace where agents can access selected apps and folders to complete tasks in the background using their own system accounts. Users must opt in and grant permissions manually. Microsoft warns of risks such as hallucinations and cross-prompt attacks, urging cautious use.
title: Microsoft Tests Agent Workspace in Windows 11, Can Access Apps and Folders to Complete Tasks

description: Oppo’s Find X9 Pro aims to outdo last year’s Find X8 Pro. It’s well-equipped when it comes to hardware and sees upgrades on nearly every front. Of course there is a bit of give and take involved. Thankfully, Oppo has also launched a custom Hasselblad Teleconverter Kit for enthusiasts, which helps it go above and beyond when it comes to smartphone photography.
title: Oppo Find X9 Pro Review: A ‘Pro’ Flagship With ‘Ultra’ Capability

description: Bharat Gas customers in India can book LPG cylinders through several convenient methods, including IVRS numbers, a missed call, WhatsApp booking, the BharatGas mobile app, the official website and their local distributor. Most services require a registered mobile number. Customers receive instant SMS confirmation once the booking is complete. These options provide quick, accessible and nationwide support for refilling LPG cylinders.
title: Bharat Gas Booking Numbers: How to Book LPG Cylinder Using Different Methods

description: Cloudflare’s global network is facing disruptions, causing multiple websites and services to go offline. Platforms like X and downtime trackers are affected. The outage began recently and has been acknowledged by Cloudflare, which is actively working on fixes, including scheduled maintenance across several data centers to restore normal operations.
title: Cloudflare Outage Knocks Several Websites, Services Offline Including X and Downtime Tracking Websites

description: In an exclusive conversation with Gadgets 360, WazirX founder Nischal Shetty discusses the exchange’s phased relaunch after its cyberattack, India’s recent legal clarity on cryptocurrency, and the potential role of an INR-backed stablecoin. He explains why the exchange restarted gradually, addresses user concerns about withdrawals, and offers insights into how court rulings and digital currency plans could influence India’s broader crypto ecosystem.
title: From Courtrooms to CBDCs: WazirX Founder Nischal Shetty on India’s Evolving Crypto Sector

description: Motorola could be preparing to launch another handset, as a phone with an octa core chipset from Qualcomm has been spotted on the Geekbench benchmarking platform. The unnamed Motorola phone is said to be powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 7+ Gen 5 SoC, which is yet to be launched by the company. Since the company has yet to confirm the details, the information should be taken with a pinch of salt. Moreover, the smartphone was spotted with 16GB of RAM and Android 16.
title: Motorola Smartphone With Mysterious Snapdragon Chip Listed on Geekbench: Expected Specifications, Features

description: Apple updated its App Review Guidelines to restrict how developers share user data with third-party AI systems. The company now requires apps to clearly disclose when personal data is sent to external AI tools and obtain explicit user permission. Developers must also justify data sharing and name the AI models involved. Apple warns that non-compliant apps may be removed from the App Store.
title: Apple Cracks Down on AI Data Sharing With New App Review Guidelines

description: If you’re encountering issues like outdated pages, connection timeouts, or websites not loading, then it is likely that this could be a problem related to the DNS cache. Fortunately, there’s an easy fix for this, where flushing the DNS cache can refresh the browser’s memory and get you back on track. Here's our step-by-step guide on how to flush DNS cache on Google Chrome for Android, iOS, and desktop.
title: How to Clear DNS Cache in Google Chrome: A Step-by-Step Guide for Android, iOS, and Desktop

description: India Blockchain Week (IBW) will return to Bengaluru from December 1 to 7 for its third edition, featuring conferences, workshops, and community events focused on Web3, AI, and blockchain regulation. Organised by Hashed Emergent, the week will include global speakers, developer programmes and ecosystem initiatives, with participation expected from exchanges, foundations and investors across more than 40 countries.
title: IBW 2025 Dates Announced: Week-Long Web3 Events Scheduled for December

description: Microsoft has announced an Xbox Partner Previe event for this week. The partner preview broadcast will take place on Thursday, November 20. It will be livestreamed on Xbox's YouTube and Twitch channels. The show will feature a new look at content coming to IO Interactive's 007 First Light.
title: Microsoft to Host Xbox Partner Preview This Week, Featuring IO Interactive's 007 First Light

description: A new Geekbench listing has revealed key details of a OnePlus device believed to be the upcoming OnePlus Ace 6T, showing scores of 2,981 in single-core and 10,136 in multi-core tests. The listing confirms Android 16, 16GB RAM and the Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset with an Adreno 840 GPU. OnePlus will launch the Ace 6T in China this month, and teasers highlight a 165fps display and a large battery. The phone is expected to debut globally as the OnePlus 15R.
title: OnePlus Ace 6T Reportedly Spotted on Geekbench With Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 SoC

description: Paytm is rolling out a new Hide Payments feature, which allows users to move certain transactions out of the primary transaction view. As per the company, it is a more private and personalised way to manage digital payments. Transactions that are marked as hidden are not deleted or altered, but remain in a separate protected section. Hidden transactions can be viewed in the Balance & History section in the Paytm app.
title: Paytm Rolls Out Hide Payments Feature to Manage Transaction Visibility: How to Use

description: Angel Has Fallen is a Gerald Butler-starrer action thriller film that is now streaming on Lionsgate Play. The film has intense action and conspiracy sequences.
title: Angel Has Fallen Streaming Now Online: Know Where to Watch This Gerald Butler Starrer Film Online

description: Asus ProArt P16, the company's latest creator-focused laptop, has been launched in India. The device sports a 16-inch 4K (3,840x2,400 pixels) OLED touchscreen with stylus support and 120Hz refresh rate. It is powered by an AMD Ryzen AI 9 HX 370 processor, coupled with up to 64GB of LPDDR5X RAM and up to 2TB SSD. For graphics, the laptop gets up to an Nvidia GeForce RTX 5090 GPU with 24GB GDDR7 VRAM. It is presently available in the country via Amazon, Asus India online store, and select offline retail outlets.
title: Asus ProArt P16 Launched With Up To Nvidia GeForce RTX 5090 GPU, Ryzen AI 9 HX 370 Processor: Price, Features

description: Moto G57 Power was recently unveiled in global markets. Now, the smartphone maker has announced the phone's India launch date. Moreover, the tech firm has teased some key specifications of the upcoming phone. In India, it will be powered by a Snapdragon 6s Gen 4 chipset, paired with a 7,000mAh battery, which is the same as the global variant. The Moto G57 Power will be offered in the country via Flipkart in at least three colourways. It will also carry a triple rear camera unit.
title: Moto G57 Power India Launch Date Announced; Will Debut With 7,000mAh Battery

description: Bitcoin fell below $90,000 as selling pressure deepened across the crypto market, driven by ETF outflows, tightening macro conditions and aggressive deleveraging. Altcoins also slid sharply, with Ethereum, Solana and BNB losing key support levels. Analysts noted the downturn marks a late-stage correction rather than a structural breakdown, though sentiment has dropped to extreme fear. Traders are watching whether the $90,000–$92,000 support zone attracts fresh buy-side interest.
title: Bitcoin Price Slumps to $89,900 as Fear, Caution Grip Crypto Market

description: Elon Musk’s xAI released the Grok 4.1 artificial intelligence (AI) model on Monday. The successor to Grok 4, which arrived in July, brings several improvements and new capabilities. The AI firm claims that the newer version of the large language model offers better emotional intelligence, creative writing, and reduced hallucinations.
title: Elon Musk’s xAI Releases Grok 4.1 AI Model, Rolled Out to All Users

description: Jeff Bezos has reportedly founded a new artificial intelligence (AI) startup called Project Prometheus, where he will serve as co-CEO alongside Vik Bajaj. The early-stage company has reportedly raised $6.2 billion and focuses on AI for the physical economy. The startup is said to have hired talent from major AI labs and may soon be formally announced.
title: Jeff Bezos Set to Head Project Prometheus, Building AI for Physical World Applications: Report

description: Oppo has launched the Enco Buds 3 Pro+ in India alongside the Find X9 series. Priced at Rs. 2,099 and offered in Midnight Black and Sonic Blue, the earbuds will go on sale from November 21 with a first-sale price of Rs. 1,899. The new TWS model adds 32dB ANC, Bluetooth 5.4, and a 12.4mm dynamic driver, claiming to offer up to 43 hours of total playback. Oppo also highlights fast charging, IP55 resistance, and TÜV Rheinland Battery Health Certification for long-term battery durability.
title: Oppo Enco Buds 3 Pro+ Launched in India With ANC, Up to 43 Hours Total Battery Life: Price, Features

description: The Oppo Find X9 series was launched in India on Tuesday. The latest flagship lineup from the China-based OEM includes two models — Oppo Find X9 and Find X9 Pro. Both handsets will be powered by MediaTek’s flagship Dimensity 9500 chipset. The brand has already confirmed that the Find X9 series will be equipped with a triple rear camera system co-developed by Hasselblad. The Find X9 and Find X9 Pro run on ColorOS 16 based on Android 16.
title: Oppo Find X9, Oppo Find X9 Pro Launched in India With MediaTek Dimensity 9500 Chipset: Price, Specifications

description: Poco F8 Ultra specifications have been surfacing online for a while. Recently, the smartphone was reported to feature a recently launched Snapdragon chipset. Now, the Chinese tech firm has confirmed that the Poco F8 Ultra will be powered by an octa core 3nm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. This comes soon after the company announced that the Poco F8 series, comprising the Poco F8 Ultra and Poco F8 Pro, will be launched globally on November 26. It is also confirmed to feature a VisionBoost D8 chip.
title: Poco F8 Ultra Confirmed to Launch With Flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chip

description: The Game Awards announced the full list of nominees for the best games in 2025 across multiple categories. Acclaimed RPG Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 led with 12 nominations, including Game of the Year. Other Game of the Year nominated games include Death Stranding 2: On the Beach, Donkey Kong Bananza, Hades 2, Hollow Knight: Silksong, and Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2.
title: The Game Awards 2025 Nominees Announced: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Leads With 12 Nominations

description: The Apple Watch Series 12 could debut with minimal changes in terms of design, as per the tipster. The tech giant has not made significant changes to the design of its smartwatch ever since the first model, prioritising iterative changes instead. Apple is tipped to bring major design changes to the Apple Watch following the 20th anniversary of the iPhone, and the lineup could be introduced in 2028.
title: Apple Watch Series 12 Tipped to Come With Minimal Design Changes; Redesigned Model May Debut in 2028

description: Google DeepMind and Google Research have released WeatherNext 2, an upgraded AI weather forecasting model that offers one-hour resolution and generates hundreds of scenarios within a minute using a single TPU. It is eight times faster than last year’s GenCast and is now accessible via Earth Engine, BigQuery and Vertex AI. Google says it delivers more accurate forecasts across up to 15 days.
title: Google DeepMind Releases WeatherNext 2, a Forecasting AI Model for Users

description: Abidur Chowdhury, a key designer behind the first iPhone Air and the face of its launch video, has reportedly left Apple, marking another significant change within the company’s already shifting design organisation. His departure comes as the original iPhone Air struggles with weak demand and production pauses. Apple is currently said to be working on a second-generation version featuring upgraded hardware, though its launch has been delayed. The updated iPhone Air is now expected to debut in spring 2027 as part of a new staggered iPhone release strategy.
title: iPhone Air Designer Abidur Chowdhury Reportedly Quits Company for AI Startup

description: Oppo Reno 15C is confirmed to launch as an "entry-level" offering in the recently launched Reno 15 series. The company teased the debut of the handset while unveiling the Reno 15 Pro and Reno 15, which are powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 8450 chipset. The handset is shown to feature a triple rear camera setup. It is confirmed to be available in at least two colourways. The Reno 15C is rumoured to sport a 6.59-inch display, which could be slightly larger than the Reno 15's 6.32-inch Flexible AMOLED screen.
title: Oppo Reno 15C Launch Teased After Company Unveils Reno 15 Series; Will Debut in China in December

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra and Galaxy S26 could be thinner and lighter than this year's Galaxy S25 Ultra and Galaxy S25, according to the leaked dimensions of the Galaxy S26 series. However, the Galaxy S26+, which might succeed the Galaxy S25+, is said to weigh slightly more than its predecessor, while retaining the thickness. On top of this, in comparison to the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max, the entire Galaxy S26 lineup will reportedly weigh less and measure less thickness.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26 Ultra to Be Slimmer and Lighter Than Their Predecessors, Tipster Claims

description: Apple's iOS 26.2 beta 3 update has rolled out to developers and testers with several new features and refinements. The update introduces temporary AirDrop codes for 30-day sharing with non-contacts and adjusts Sleep Score ratings. Apple Podcasts gains AI-generated chapters, while Apple News gets a cleaner layout. The update adds a Liquid Glass Lock Screen slider, refreshed Measure app visuals, and new Reminders alarms for urgent tasks. It also enables Hypertension Notification access for third-party apps and updates the Games app.
title: Apple's iOS 26.2 Beta 3 Rolled Out With AirDrop Upgrades, Liquid Glass Tweaks and More

description: Lava Mobiles on Monday announced a new initiative that allows consumers to get early access to its upcoming flagship smartphone, the Lava Agni 4. Dubbed the Demo@Home campaign, it facilitates the visit of a Lava engineer to their homes for a complete walkthrough and a chance to try out the device’s design and capabilities before they make a purchasing decision. The Lava Agni 4, notably, is scheduled to be launched in India on November 20.
title: Lava Agni 4 Home Demo Campaign Lets Buyers Experience the Phone Before Purchase

description: OnePlus has teased the upcoming launch of a new smartphone in India that could join the recently announced OnePlus 15. Dubbed the OnePlus 15R, it is expected to be the latest addition to the OnePlus 15 series, and may be based on either the China-exclusive OnePlus Ace 6 or the upcoming OnePlus Ace 6T. The purported handset is shown in two colourways, sporting a dual rear camera system inside a square deco.
title: OnePlus 15R Teased to Launch in India Soon; Colourways Revealed Ahead of Launch

description: Oppo Find X9 series, the Chinese tech firm's flagship smartphone lineup, is set to launch in India today at 12pm IST. The series is confirmed to comprise the Find X9 Pro and the Find X9. The phones will go on sale in the country via Oppo's website and Flipkart. The prices of the handsets were recently spotted on an Indian retailer's website, suggesting that the Pro model could be offered in a single RAM and storage configuration. On the other hand, the Find X9 is expected to be available in at least two storage variants.
title: Oppo Find X9 Series Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features, Specifications and More
